statements: SELECT * FROM time_logs WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT employee_id, log_date FROM time_logs WHERE total_hours > '5 hours';
SELECT start_time, end_time FROM time_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT log_id, total_hours FROM time_logs WHERE employee_id = '987e6543-21b8-43d2-8654-142176364000';
SELECT * FROM time_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT log_date, start_time, end_time, total_hours FROM time_logs WHERE employee_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc' ORDER BY log_date DESC, start_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT log_id, employee_id, log_date, total_hours FROM time_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' AND log_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_hours DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM time_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND total_hours > INTERVAL '40 hours'
SELECT employee_id, SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM total_hours)) AS total_seconds FROM time_logs GROUP BY employee_id HAVING SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM total_hours)) > 3600
SELECT count(*) AS total_logs, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM total_hours)) AS avg_hours FROM time_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM time_logs WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT employee_id, log_date, log_hours FROM time_logs WHERE log_hours > 8
SELECT * FROM time_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM work_hours ORDER BY total_hours DESC
SELECT employee_id, work_days FROM work_hours WHERE work_days < 5
SELECT * FROM time_logs WHERE log_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, log_hours FROM time_logs WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY log_hours DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(log_hours) AS total_hours FROM time_logs GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_hours > 40;
SELECT tl.employee_id, wh.total_hours, tl.log_date FROM time_logs tl JOIN work_hours wh ON tl.employee_id = wh.employee_id ORDER BY tl.log_date DESC;
SELECT tl.log_id, tl.log_date, wh.work_days FROM time_logs tl LEFT JOIN work_hours wh ON tl.employee_id = wh.employee_id WHERE tl.log_hours > 8 AND wh.total_hours < 40;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department='Engineering';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employees ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS num_employees FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(hours_worked) AS avg_hours_worked FROM TimeLogs GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, start_datetime, end_datetime, total_hours FROM WorkHours WHERE total_hours > 8 ORDER BY total_hours DESC, start_datetime ASC;
SELECT log_id, employee_id, log_timestamp, hours_worked, task_description FROM TimeLogs WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, start_datetime, end_datetime, total_hours FROM WorkHours WHERE total_hours > 8 ORDER BY start_datetime ASC, end_datetime DESC;
SELECT log_id, hours_worked FROM TimeLogs WHERE task_description LIKE '%meeting%' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(total_hours) AS total_work_hours FROM WorkHours GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_work_hours > 40 ORDER BY total_work_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM time_logs WHERE log_hours > 8;
SELECT log_date, log_hours FROM time_logs WHERE log_hours < 5 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE policy_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM work_hours WHERE work_date = '2022-01-20' AND hours_worked > 7;
SELECT * FROM time_logs
SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM employees
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies
SELECT log_date, log_hours FROM time_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC
SELECT employee_name, hours_worked FROM employees INNER JOIN work_hours ON employees.employee_id = work_hours.employee_id
SELECT * FROM time_logs;
SELECT log_id, employee_id, activity FROM time_logs WHERE duration > 5;
SELECT department_name, department_id FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE hourly_rate > 50 ORDER BY name;
SELECT MAX(max_hours_per_day) AS max_hours FROM remote_work_policy;
SELECT * FROM time_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT log_id, employee_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM work_hours ORDER BY date ASC, start_time DESC;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM departments WHERE department_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, max_hours_per_day, max_hours_per_week FROM remote_work_policy WHERE max_hours_per_day > 8;
